pkgmetadata.longdescription: Propensity Score Matching and Subclassification in Observational Studies with Multi-Level Treatments // Implements methods to estimate causal effects from observational studies when there are 2+ distinct levels of treatment (i.e., "multilevel treatment") using matching estimators, as introduced in Yang et al. (2016) doi:10.1111/biom.12505. Matching on covariates, and matching or stratification on modeled propensity scores, are available. These methods require matching on only a scalar function of generalized propensity scores.
